quote: Dan’s work is always faultless, he has incredible attention to detail and top communication skills. You can find many talented developers but the ones that are as organised and as proactive as Dan are priceless.
author: Jennie Lewis — Sunside Studio

quote: Dan can wear many hats and is a pleasure to work with. He’s always ready to problem solve and has a natural talent for communication. Working with a bright developer like Dan has only brought positive outcomes. Talk soon Dan!
author: Simon — Bureau Billy

quote: Dan has been the most joyous web developer I’ve ever had the pleasure to work with. I could not be more impressed and more thankful for his management, understanding, clarity, and of course his beautiful development skills.
author: Elaine Mitchell — Studio 1850

quote: To Uncle Dan...You are really nice!
author: William — Dan’s Nephew
